snippet: Determined trick-or-treaters and their parents held costumed block parties in many New York City neighborhoods.
abstract: Determined trick-or-treaters and their parents hold costumed block parties in many New York City neighborhoods despite Hurricane Sandy's impact on the city and the postponement of the city's famed Greenwich Village Halloween Parade.
lead_paragraph: Determined trick-or-treaters and their parents held costumed block parties in many New York City neighborhoods.

headline.seo: Ghouls Manage to Haunt, Despite Storm
headline.main: Plenty of Ghouls and Witches Manage to Haunt on Schedule
headline.print_headline: Plenty of Ghouls and Witches Manage to Haunt on Schedule
